Kayak over beautiful Coral Reefs along the Wailea Coastline in search of our visiting friends, the Hawaiian Humpback Whale.

*All Equipment Included.

name: Molokini Snorkel & Dive - Kilikina II
description: Your South Maui boat diving adventures and education start here with our signature 2-tank/2-location dive featuring a Molokini Crater back wall swim (weather permitting).

name: Premium Whale Watch
description: Join us for Maui's best whale watch aboard Teralani's Premium Whale Watch where you'll enjoy an Island style lunch, open bar and Ka'anapali's only 2.5 hour whale watch with Maui's majestic humpback whales.

name: Macadamia Nut & Hydroponic Tour
description: Explore Maui’s agricultural magic on this hands-on tour that offers more than just memories. You’ll visit a macadamia nut farm and get an up-close look at hydroponic gardening and sustainable farming practices.

name: Molokini Crater and 2nd Site Scuba and Snorkel
description: We always have a fabulous dive trip planned, but sometimes mother nature does not cooperate. If conditions are not safe or suitable for any particular dive site, the captain may make a judgement call and take you to the best possible dive site of the...

name: Private Bottom Fishing Charter
description: Marjorie Ann is a 36′ Chesapeake Bay deadrise style fishing boat with a comfortable cabin, large back deck, and plenty of shade.

name: Kayak Tours
description: All tours at Kayak Olowalu are led by expert guides, and last about 2.5 hours. Private tours are available upon request.   Snorkel gear and light refreshments afterwards are included in the tour price.

name: Morning Waterfall Walk & Swim
description: This is the perfect choice if you want a short, easy walk to two waterfalls in our gorgeous Maui rainforest valley.

name: Sea Caves along Kanaio Coast & La Perouse Snorkel

description: Our Instructor Team: Our team includes only the most experienced instructors and trainers who utilize the safest teaching procedures. Each Action Sports Instructor also receives ongoing training to help them reach and maintain the highest standards.

name: Wailea Coastline Discovery
company: Maui Eco Tours/South Pacific Kayak/Kelii's Kayaks
description: The most convenient launching point in Wailea for a kayak & snorkel tour. This excursion is about two (2) miles of easy going paddling cruising along the classic Wailea coastline where you'll find world class resorts.

name: Herbal Tea Tasting Tour
description: Visitors will then take a stroll through the beautiful grounds, where they can admire the majestic West Maui Mountains, its rich Hawaiian culture, its plantation history and the cultivation of various exotic fruit plants.

description: You can take our time at the summit to marvel at the amazing moonscape-like scenery, peer into the “crater,” and catch sight of the Big Island’s Mauna Kea across the Alenuihaha channel. We will also keep an eye out for the unique silversword plant.

description: Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 48 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

name: Pride of Maui 'Elua Luxury Fourth of July Cruise
description: Our well stocked premium open bar offers a selection of fine wines, tropical concoctions, martinis, Mai Tais, and various ice-cold imported and local Maui beers.

description: Tucked beneath the cliffs are large coral outcroppings that make for beautiful underwater topography and snorkeling. We have a variety of sites along this coast which are some of Maui’s premier snorkel sites including coral gardens and Olowalu.

description: Set out on a full-day journey along Maui’s legendary Road to Hana in the comfort of a luxury Mercedes-Benz van.

name: SUP Celebration!
description: Flowers and Leis are your greeting when you arrive (Flower Lei for Guest of Honor/Shell Leis for Honored Guests).

name: Multi Day Surf Course

name: Stand-Up-Paddle Lesson
description: Stand up paddle boarding is a becoming a very popular pastime. And is fun for all ages. Also know as "SUP", It was originally called "beach boy surfing", named after the famous Waikiki beach boys, who combined their outrigger canoe paddling skills wi...

name: Windsurf Multi-Day Courses
description:
5 Day Course
The “Classic 5-day” course includes two and a half hours (2.5hrs) of progressive windsurfing instruction per day for five days. The days need not be consecutive. So we can fit the course to suit your vacation, and the weather conditions.

name: Sunset Dinner Sail
description: Relax as Gemini’s crew set sail for two hours of smooth and exciting trade wind sailing with phenomenal views of the West Maui Mountains, Molokai and Lanai.

name: Maui Goat Yoga with Our Miniature Goats
description: Enjoy beautiful views of Maui’s breathtaking coastline and relish the psychological benefits of animal-assisted therapy while practicing yoga and challenging your physical and mental capacity.

name: Group SUP
description: The Group SUP Tour is a 1.5 hour Stand-Up Paddle lesson that tours the coastline of one of Maui's most beautiful beaches.

name: Zipline Adventure Tour
description: Fly over dragon fruit fields on our fast and exhilarating zipline. The Dragon Zipline is a fast medium range gravity breaking zipline. It is 450 feet long and great for doing ziplining tricks like the inverted V, scorpion, lay back or spinning.

name: Aquaball Adventure Tour
description:
Integrated Organic Farming Tour
Our kid and family friendly adventure tour takes place on the grounds of the Maui Dragonfruit Farm, a USDA certified organic farm with incredible ocean and West Maui Mountain views.

name: Birdwatching Private Tour
description: After a picnic lunch in the Park, we head to the Kealia National Wildlife Refuge to find shore birds and migrants.

description:

We highly recommend to meet us at Target in Kahului at 8:00am in order to take full advantage of our time on the trail.

company: Myths of Maui Luau at the Royal Lahaina Resort
description: Experience Maui's longest-running and most exciting luau at the Royal Lahaina Resort & Bungalows. The Myths of Maui luau is an oceanfront event that offers a sumptuous all-you-care-to-eat buffet, complimentary cocktails, and a thrilling Polynesian st...

description: Make this a serene trip or party it up! Spend your time snorkeling Turtle Gardens seeing turtles, tons of wildlife & the coral reef. Your private party has the option of anchoring up with tunes, a cooler & the best views while you snorkel.

description: REEL IN A CATCH OF A LIFETIME FROM A KAYAK. Made popular by Sports Illustrated, Hawaii Kayak Fishing has gained popularity in the last few years with visitors traveling from around the world to fish the waters of Maui from a kayak.

description: Building on lessons from your Shore dive portion, you'll apply the knowledge and experience of diving form the shore, two the boat, enabling lifelong, deeper dives and offering as many locations as your imagination and passport can contain.

name: PADI Advanced Open Water Certification (part  2) - Boat
description: The Boat Dive portion of your two-part Advanced Open Water Diver course helps you increase your confidence and builds your scuba skills so you can become more comfortable in the water.

description: This is our most popular hike in an amazingly unique valley. Dazzling waterfalls from 10 to 40 feet high, large clear swimming pools under each of the falls, magical rainforests, and freshwater streams.

description: This is our most popular hike in an amazingly unique valley. Dazzling waterfalls from 10 to 40 feet high, large clear swimming pools under each of the falls, magical rainforests, and freshwater streams.

name: Sunset Glow Snorkel @ Turtle Town With Photo and Video
description: Being the only ones on Maui to offer a sunset glow tour sets this entire activity apart! Sunset into dusk is an amazing time to snorkel because of the variety of marine life you will see, that isn't out during the day.

description: We do require a minimum of 4 guests for our trip to be confirmed. If your booking doesn’t meet that minimum right away, don’t worry we’ll always reach out ahead of time to let you know the status and do our best to get you on a confirmed trip that fi...

description:
Authentic Performances from Tahiti, Hawai‘i, Aotearoa (Māori), and Samoa.
Immersive Lighting simulating fire and water for a modern, cinematic twist.
High-Energy Dance & Chant, including Haka, Hula Kahiko, Hula ‘Auana, and more.

name: Kids Surf Camp
description: Our experienced instructors will give your Kids their personal attention and share the surfing experience with them. Learning to surf should be safe and fun, and  empowering. Kids need closer supervision than adults.

description: This eco adventure is guided and include 2 snorkel sights, kayak gear, life jackets, snorkel gear, a bottle of water and a light snack. Typically, group sizes are held to 10 people or less to ensure a quality and personalized experience.

name: Tropical Fruit Tasting Walking Tour
description: After the tasting, our knowledgeable guides will take you on a stroll. You will get a closer look at the plants producing this excellent fruit.

name: Unique Road to Hana
description:
We pick you up from your hotel or meet in Kahului at 8am—but it’s a private tour, so it’s flexible if you need it to be, just let us know!
Meet at Target Kahului, or free hotel pick-up for South side properties (Kihei, Wailea, Ma'alaea).

Integrated Organic Farming Tour

description: Our educational, hands on butterfly farm tours are now available and take place ​at The Maui Butt​erfly Farm at 820 Olowalu Village Rd, Lahaina, Hi 96761

name: Open Water Scuba Diver Referral Course
description: All of our courses are taught in small groups - so that you get the most out of your time underwater. This means you'll receive specialized attention, feel safer, and get to spend more time underwater.

name: Whale Watch and/or Scenic Wildlife Tour
description: Or if whales season has ended, cruise along the West Maui Coast with our peddle drive system, freeing your hands for a cold beverage, GoPro or even long-range camera lens for those beautiful West Maui Mountain photos.

name: Group Bottom Fishing Tour
description: Although rare, we reserve the right to change or cancel tours based on unsafe weather or ocean conditions. If we are unable to find another availability, a full refund is provided.

description: This course is designed as a direct follow-up to the PADI Open Water certification program. Advanced Open Water Certification builds on what you've learned previously, introducing new activities and new ways to have fun scuba diving.

description: Guests are fully responsible for their safety and their gear at all times during the tour.  We are not responsible for injury of any type or damage of any kind to your gear.

name: Private Maui’s Sea Turtles, Waterfalls and Taste of Hana Adventure
description:
Hana Highway
Road to Hana It's all about the journey on the Road to Hana, traveling in style and comfort along cascading waterfalls, scenic, lush vistas, and windy roads.

name: Hike into Heritage: Luxury Rainforest Hike & Waterfall Swim - Private Cadillac Escalade
description: As you traverse the lush, verdant trails, your native guide — deeply rooted in the local community — will share tales and traditions of the Hawaiian people, offering a rare and personal perspective of Maui’s heritage.

name: 4 Divers for 3 Days - Private PADI Certification with Barry
description: Interested in learning to scuba dive? You’ve come to the right place. Scuba lessons unlock the door to new adventures and amazing animal encounters. By the end of your scuba certification course, you’ll see our ocean planet through new eyes.

name: July 4th Premium Dinner Cruise
description:
-Appetizer: Appetizer: Warm King’s Hawaiian Sweet Rolls with kula honey butter and black lava salt
-Salad: Local watermelon and tomato salad – thick cut watermelon with tomato and basil bruschetta, local herb pesto, feta cheese and balsamic reduction...

name: Pride of Maui: Afternoon Turtle Town Snorkel Tour
description: Late risers, sleep in, then join us for an afternoon of exceptional snorkeling. We routinely snorkel with the turtles at Turtle Town or enjoy a variety of colorful marine animals at Olowalu or Coral Gardens, depending upon which location is the calme...

name: One Hour Elopement
description: Ready to tie the knot? Join us on the beach in Maui, barefoot in the sand for your private elopement. Stress-free, fun and intimate. Limited to small groups and one location. 60 minutes of shooting & 75+ images edited in high resolution.

name: Custom Private Charter - Winona Sail Catamaran
description: Picture yourself on Winona's spacious decks, enjoying the shaded central cabin, entertainment, and a menu tailored to your desires. It's the perfect setting for a unique and memorable occasion that will leave you lasting memories.

name: AM Serenity Snorkel
description: Enjoy a nourishing island-style continental breakfast featuring overnight oats, volcano spiced hard-boiled eggs, fresh local fruit, and house-made pastries with a cup of Maui-made coffee.

name: Kids Surf Class
description: Our experienced instructors will give your Kids their personal attention and share the surfing experience with them. Learning to surf should be safe and fun, and  empowering. Kids need closer supervision than adults.

description:

· Maui Chocolate & Coffee Tour
· Maui Pineapple Tour
· Outrigger canoe cultural tour
· Zip line
· … or even a day...

name: Kayak, Snorkel & Waterfall Combo Tour
description: Do it all – ocean kayak and snorkel, waterfalls, and rainforests – in one 7-hour trip. Hug Maui’s rugged coastline as you kayak in the calm morning ocean. Snorkel off your kayak among colorful fish, coral, and inquisitive sea turtles.

name: Honolua Ridgeline Hike: A Conservation Experience
description: Located in West Maui, above the prestigious Kapalua resort area, this extraordinary journey takes you into the Maunalei Arboretum, ascending the Honolua Ridgeline, ending at an incredible lookout where you have a panoramic view of the Pu'u Kukui Wate...

name: 2 Tank Carthaginian Shipwreck and Turtle/Shark Dive by Boat
description: Just a short distance off Maui’s shore, under the stunning Pacific blue water, lies a slice of history. Join us for a 2 tank guided boat to dive the Carthaginian wreck and a second breathtaking dive with turtles and sharks.

name: Kahanu Garden Self|Guided Tour
company: Kahanu Garden - National Tropical Botanical Gardens
description: Wander leisurely around the garden and linger at what intrigues you – plants, archaeological and cultural features. You create your own adventure.

name: 2 Piece Private Lesson (1.5 hours)
description:
• Ages 5 and up
• All participants must sign a waiver
• Required attire is closed-toed shoes, and wear a cotton t-shirt, and shorts/pants

name: Polaris Slingshot R
description: Zip through the Hawaiian landscape in a current model year, low mileage Polaris Slingshot. Navigation, Rockford Fosgate Bluetooth stereo systems, upgraded comfortable seats, and lockable storage are standard on our fleet.

name: Private Sunset Charter • Monohull Nova
description: Take your loved one and friends sailing on your own boat with the help of a few crew. If desired, we offer a hands-on learning experience for those who wish to learn about sailing!

name: Monohull Private Custom Charter ~ Nova
description: S/V Nova is a unique experience in that it offers pleasant, personal, private sailing adventures for up to six passengers. We have done weddings, proposals, birthdays, ash scatterings, and private dinners.

name: Road to Hana Slingshot Adventure Tour - Navigation Guided
description: Combining the top Maui destination with the Ultimate Hawaiian Joyride, you get memories that last a lifetime. Simply the #1 way to experience the Road to Hana! Our Polaris Slingshots give you the ultimate Hana Adventure.

name: North Loop Coast Slingshot Adventure - Navigation Guided
description: Combining one of Maui’s top destinations with the Ultimate Hawaiian Joyride, you get memories that last a lifetime. The Maui North Loop Coast Cruise is an amazing experience!

name: Haleakala Volcano Summit Sunrise or Sunset Adventure Tour - Navigation Guided
description: Combining one of Maui’s top destinations with the Ultimate Hawaiian Joyride, you get memories that last a lifetime. The climb to the top is breathtaking with the Slingshots’ unobstructed views!!

name: Private Land and Sea Tour - Upcountry Sunset
description: This option puts you on a private whale-watching boat to enjoy the beauty of Maui's breathtaking whale season.

name: PADI Advanced Open Water Diver Course
description: The Advanced Course consists of 5 dives and can be completed in 2 water days. The 5 dives you will complete are each a PADI adventure dive. The deep and navigation dives are required, but there are 3 dives you can select based on what interests you.

name: Private Surfing Lessons
description: Our Surf lessons are taught on one of Maui’s most exclusive and beautiful surf beaches. Our 1.5hr sessions include a surfboards and rash guards. We also offer reef-safe sunscreen to ensure you and the coral reef are protected.

name: Sacred Hawaiian Wellness Retreat
description: Step into a world of serenity and ancient Hawaiian healing with this cultural and spiritual retreat designed to renew your body, mind, and soul.

name: We Go! Eco Snorkeling 101 for Non-Swimmers

description: Come join us for a shoreline snorkeling adventure as explore the beautiful reef ecosystems and marine life in the oceans of Maui safely with one of our local tour guides.

description: Guided by one of our local tour guides, follow along with us on a unique adventure as we explore Maui’s westside scenery from land to sea.

Our Crystal Clear Kayak Experience is perfect for those would-be snorkelers who prefer to not get too wet. You won't need a snorkeling mask when your whole boat is one.

name: Restorative Cat Yoga
description: Come stretch and try out some cat poses! Practice your yoga breathing and learn to stay in position while a cat tail wraps around your ankle. Let the cats come to you, and enhance your yoga consciousness with furry healing for the mind and body.

name: Clear Kayak with Pontoons + Snorkel Tour
description: Paddle out on a guided tour over majestic coral heads in search of Maui's vast array of sea life. The bottom of the clear kayak magnifies the reef and all of the creatures below you.

description: Enjoy the experience without the stress of driving the Hana Highway and avoid being exhausted by doing the full-day Road to Hana tour.

company: Botanical World Adventures - Segway Off Road and Zip Isle Zip Line
description: Our exciting zipline course features eight exhilarating lines and a Suspension Bridge that will leave you breathless. Plus, you'll be surrounded by jaw-dropping views of waterfalls, the rainforest, and even whales during the winter season.

name: Kealakekua Snorkel and Sail
description: Begin the morning with a light continental breakfast that includes 100% Kona coffee, tropical fruits and pastries as we set the sail and head down the beautiful Kona coast.

name: COMBO: Sunset and Manta Ray Snorkel
description: Parking in Kona town can be challenging, especially during peak travel seasons.  We do offer validated parking for our guests that wish to park at the Courtyard Marriott King Kamehameha Kona Beach Hotel. The parking fee is $13 for the day.

name: 2-Tank Local Morning Dive Charter
description: We ask all guests to arrive promptly at the scheduled charter time.  Do not underestimate driving time.

name: Captain Cook Monument Kealakekua Bay Snorkeling Tour
description: Explore the stunning underwater world of Kealakekua Bay, located on the Big Island and home to the historic Captain Cook monument. Our top-rated Kona snorkel tours offer a remarkable snorkeling experience along Hawaii's captivating coastline.

name: Kona Snorkeling in Pawai Bay
description: Visit one of Kona’s most beautiful and exclusive local snorkeling spots, only accessible by boat.  Only a handful of visitors get to snorkel here each day, and you could be one of them!

description: Join us on the Kona Explorer, a 41 ft. Super-Raft, for a thrilling 4-hour morning snorkel adventure. Visit two of Kona's most underrated snorkeling sites, where in-water guides will enhance your experience.

description: Join us aboard the Kona Explorer, our 41 ft. Super-Raft, for a 2.5-hour sunset tour along the Kona coast.

description:
Hawaii’s Craft Chocolate Revolution
Immerse yourself in the most extensive craft chocolate tasting in Hawaii! Sample 10+ exclusive single-origin bars, each crafted from beans from farms around Hawaii.

name: Deluxe Snorkel & Dolphin Watch
description: Join us on the Kanoa II for a Deluxe Morning Snorkel and Dolphin Watch. Snorkel at Red Hill, a marine sanctuary home to over 600 species of ocean wildlife. Enjoy breakfast and BBQ lunch onboard, with an excellent chance of spotting dolphins.

description:

Your morning begins with a comfortable pick-up from your hotel or resort. As the coastline and mountains roll by, the landscape transforms—lush greenery giving way to Hilo’s historic charm.

name: Sunset Cruise in Hilo Bay
description: This is your chance to kick back, bring your favorite drinks (BYOB), and enjoy the boat like it’s your own private floating lanai. Want to make it even better? Add on fresh local pupus (appetizers) at checkout.

name: Hāmākua Coastline & Akaka Falls Adventure
description: Travel the historic highway along the scenic Hāmākua Coastline, passing lush landscapes and dramatic views of Onomea Bay.

name: Midday Meander: Kealakekua Bay Kayak and Snorkel Tour
description: We set you up with snorkel gear and give you a quick history lesson before you meet our certified guide for a spectacular paddle across the most protected deep water bay in the Hawaiian Islands.

name: Sunset Manta Snorkel and Scuba Diving Trip
description: Dive and snorkel with Kona’s majestic Manta Rays for an unforgettable vacation highlight. This world-renowned experience in the Hawaiian Islands is often described as surreal and ranks among the top ten dives globally.

name: SUP Adventure
description: Stand up Paddle Boarding or SUP is a perfect family or couples adventure. Learn the basics from our expert guides & navigate the beautiful waters of the Kohala Coast. Keep your eyes open for the beautiful marine life, turtles, & even dolphins.

name: Stand Up Paddleboard Rental
description: We rent paddle boards for 3 hours, daily, and weekly as well as vehicle mount kits to help with ease of transportation. We also include water shoes, carrying straps, and maps with each rental free of charge!

name: VIP Chocolate Tasting and Farm Tour
description:
Chocolate Tasting
After the tour of our cacao orchard, we’ll venture up to our covered lanai and tasting area and we’ll open a ripe cacao pod and taste fresh cacao fruit.

name: Ultimate Circle Island Explorer (Kohala Pick up)
PADI Scuba Diver Course
description: As a Certified PADI Scuba Diver you can dive under the direct supervision of a PADI Professional to a maximum depth of 12 meters/40 feet.

name: Fii Freediving Course
description:
Level 1 Safety & Problem Management
Freediving Equipment
Physics and Physiology for the Level 1 Freediver
Correct Breathing for Freediving
Breath-Hold/Static Apnea Technique Development
Freediving Technique Development
To pass this course level, stud...

name: The Aquatic Life Adventure Pass
description:
Your Adventure Pass is treated like cash and cannot be replaced if lost, so please safeguard it accordingly.
The Pass is for future adventures and cannot be redeemed for cash or credited back to a card, unless required by law.

name: Mālama 'Āina Service Event
description: Operator reserves the right to cancel any experiences at any time. In the case of Operator cancellation, customers will have the opportunity to rebook their experience or receive a full refund or credit.

name: Customized Big Island Tour - Kona, Hilo, Waterfalls, Volcanoes National Park & More
description:
Hawaii State law requirements:
          * Children under 2 years old: must be in a rear-facing car   
            seat with a harness.

name: KONASTYLE Private Charter
description: Let our private charter coordinators help you create the adventure of a lifetime! Our top notch service, quality food and beverage options and personalized attention ensure a once-in-a-lifetime, personalized experience.

name: Private Waterfall Experience
company: Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours - Big Island
description:
•Enjoy the stunning flyby of some of the hidden sites that Hawai'i's diverse climate can offer
•On your flight to Waimea, your helicopter will dip down into the valleys to get up close and personal with Hawaii's waterfalls, some reaching over 2000'
•...

name: Surf Tour (Call To Book)
description: Join me as we search for the Big Islands best surf. Everything from beginner waves to expert reef breaks. Each adventure is based on the surfer’s abilities and current swell.

name: Family Snorkel / Fish Charter Maheli Heli
description: Dads, Moms and Kids spend half the tour fishing and trying for Marlin or some of our native game fish such as Ono or Mahi Mahi. The rest of the day is up to you based on what's happening in the waters off shore.

name: Late Manta Ray Snorkel
description: Unfortunately, we are not able to offer any transportation services between local hotels, our shop, or the harbor.

name: Intro UFO Tour
description: This experience takes place in a comfortable outdoor setting, where you’ll sit beneath Hawaii’s star-filled sky, listening to captivating stories and watching the heavens in a way you never have before.

name: Benelli 500 Leo (500 CC)
description: Experience the beauty of Kailua Kona on a Benelli 500 motorcycle rental. This classic-styled scooter is perfect for exploring the city's many beaches, lush terrain and coastline away from major traffic.

name: Mysteries of Mauna Kea ✨
description: Home to the most active energy vortex in the pacific, and sitting directly on the 19.5 degree north line of latitude, Mauna Kea is the perfect destination to connect with both land and sky on a much deeper level.

name: Big Island Day Tour w/ Lunch
description: Join us for a half-day adventure tour exploring the Big Island from summit to sea. We offer a unique tour including hands-on artifacts, fresh fruit, historical insights, and the significance of the places we visit.

name: ‘Akaka Falls Tour - Hilo Discovery and Volcanoes National Park Explorer
description:
Hawaii State law requirements:
          * Children under 2 years old: must be in a rear-facing car   
            seat with a harness.

name: South Point Vortex Venture 🌌
description: WHAT TO EXPECT: An elemental experience like no other! Start with an immersion of the grounding energies found at Paleaku Peace Garden (EARTH), a former Buddhist sanctuary turned botanical garden.

name: Night Manta Snorkel
description: You’re going to love the way Hawaiian Adventures does mantas! Sharing this incredible experience with our guests is what drives us to run the best manta tour on the Island.

name: SHARED Heavenly Hamakua from Kona
description: Along highways old and new, we'll head from the highlands of Waimea, to the coastal jungles of Hilo down Hawaii's Hamakua coast. The backroads of the Hamakua coast wind through lush jungle gulches, crossing rivers, and passing scenic ocean vistas.

name: Choose Your Own Adventure From Hilo
description: We know, we're called The Volcano Van because our specialty are the volcanoes of the Big Island of Hawai'i. However, the Big Island does offer plenty of beautiful sights to see other then just volcanoes.

name: Triathlete Ocean Swim
description: We offer private 1 hour open water swim training sessions to help triathletes swim faster with improved swim technique and endurance. Get a personalized triathlete swim training with private swim lessons in Hilo.

name: Hilo Haunted Pub Crawl🍹
description:
TOUR OVERVIEW:
The new Hilo Haunted Pub Crawl, offered exclusively by Big Island Ghost Tours, presents a thrilling adventure into the eerie and supernatural side of Hilo, Hawaii.

name: Kona Ocean Sunset Safari
description: -During the winter months, typically from December to March, the majestic humpback whales migrate to our warm waters for breeding and calving, offering spectacular sightings.

name: COMBO: Whale Watch & Manta Ray Night Snorkel
description: While it typically isn't an issue we do have slower periods of the year it may occur.  If we do not reach our minimum, you'll be offered the option to rebook for a different day.

name: Half Day Rock Climbing
description: Due to generally poor rock quality on the island, there is very little climbing available on the Big Island of Hawaii.

name: Whale Watch
description: Our 3hour journey aboard our modern 24 passenger catamaran that is designed for open oceans conditions will allow our passengers to sit back, relax and enjoy breathtaking views of the beautiful Island of Hawaii and watch the humpback whales.

name: The Twilight Reef & Kona Manta Ray Experience: Two Tank Charter
description: One of our favorite charters! Get the best of both worlds… a fun dive exploring Kona's beautiful reef environment during daylight hours, followed by the famous Manta Ray Night Dive with some of the most majestic creatures in the ocean.

name: Private Refresher Dive
description: Flying or Driving to Altitude After Diving: After doing one dive, it is recommended you wait at least 12 hours before flying or driving to altitude.

name: Sundowner Private Charter
description: Just bring your food and drink for the day as large coolers and ice are already on board. Catering is also available on request. Fishing tackle and gear are included.

name: Volcano Vortex Hike 🌋
description: A part daytime, part evening experience to the Volcanoes National Park. Get up close and personal with Goddess Pele, creator of the Hawaiian Islands and central vortex of Hawaii's creativity energy as you venture around her home, the Halema'umau crat...

name: Private Cloud Forest Tour - Pantropical Trail (1.5 hr)
description: Walk the Pantropical Lower Loop Trail, surrounded by stunning rare trees, ferns, palms, bamboo, flowers, and the bird songs of native Hawaiian honeycreepers.

name: Meet you at Kilauea Volcano!
description: Have your own vehicle or staying in Volcano? We can meet you at the Hawai’i Volcanoes National Park! An UNESCO World Heritage Site and an International Biosphere Reserve, Hawai’i Volcanoes National Park is a must see while on the Big Island!

name: Big Island in a Day Tour from Hilo
description: This full-day nature tour offers an in-depth look at Hawaii’s youngest and largest island with departures from the City of Hilo.

name: Indian Scout (1133 CC)
description: Experience the Indian Scout: The Indian Scout is renowned for its powerful 1133cc V-twin engine, delivering an impressive 100 horsepower.

name: Island of Fire 🔥 Volcano Vortex Tour
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with Big Island Ghost Tours' new Island of Fire Volcano Vortex Day Tour, where you will journey through the volcanic wonders of Hawaii's Big Island.

name: Snorkeling & Marine Animal Excursion
description: Discover the beauty of Kona's world-class reefs with our small-group snorkeling adventures. Whether you prefer a morning swim in the calm, clear waters or an afternoon exploration, our intimate group sizes ensure a personalized and catered experience...

name: Sound Bath Special Guest - Vocal Sound Meditation led by Odeya Nini (Monday, April 14th)
description: Odeya Nini is a Los Angeles based interdisciplinary vocalist, composer, embodied vocal coach and sound meditation practitioner.

name: Volcano Vortex Explorer Tour🌋
description: Feel the magnetic pull of the Earth at the park’s most energetic locations, including steam vents, lava tubes, and sacred ground where Hawaiian kahuna once communed with the spirit world.

name: Wildlife Safari
description: For guests hoping to encounter larger predators, we’ll explore open-ocean sites where oceanic whitetip sharks and whale sharks are sometimes spotted.

name: Manta Ray Experience Private Boat
description: Experience the #1 night dive and snorkel in the World! Hawaii is the only place in the world where you can swim with gentle manta rays at night. 6 guests maximum on our Manta ray experience. Personal, safe, and intimate.

name: Private Cloud Forest Sanctuary Tour (2.5 hrs)
description: Walk the Extended Montane Jungle Trail, surrounded by stunning rare trees, ferns, palms, bamboo, flowers, and the bird songs of native Hawaiian honeycreepers.

name: Big Island: Volcano, Waterfalls & Coffee Group Tour
description: What truly sets our Big Island tour apart is our unwavering commitment to crafting a deeply engaging adventure, even within a group setting. Forget the impersonal feel of conventional bus tours.

name: Volcano After Dark - Private Kilauea Eruption Tour
description:
Q: What happens if I miss my pick-up time?
A: If you miss your pick-up time, please contact us immediately.

name: Historic Hawaii and Big Island Market Tour
description:
What Makes This Tour Unique?
What makes the Historic Hawaii and Big Island Market Tour unique is its perfect blend of cultural discovery and local charm.

name: Dolphin and Whale Watch
description: These trips are designed for those who wish to stay dry on the boat and observe pelagic marine life without any intentions to snorkel.

name: Small Group Rainforest Trail Ride
description: Enjoy a small group guided trail ride, for intermediate and advanced riders, to the Wao Kele o Puna Forest Reserve.

name: Mini Snorkeling Charter
description: Dive into crystal-clear waters teeming with coral reefs, sea turtles, colorful fish, and exotic marine life, all guided by our expert crew. Our Mini Snorkel offers incredible snorkeling opportunities with reduced travel time.

name: Volcano Direct Hiking Adventure
description: Kīlauea's current eruption in Halemaʻumaʻu crater within Kaluapele (the summit caldera) began on December 23, 2024. There have now been 30+ episodes separated by pauses in activity.

name: Other Rentals/ Reservations – Beach Shack
description: We reserve the right to charge the full amount with less than 48 hours notice of cancellation. Any cancellations before 48 hours will have a full refund.

name: Private CUSTOM VAN Tour from Kona
description: Moderate air temperatures at sea level with cooler temperatures at higher elevations on the drive from Kona; occasional rain showers; possible walks across uneven, rocky terrain including black lava rock,; red lava cannot be guaranteed on this tour;...

name: Private CUSTOM VAN Tour from Hilo
description: Moderate air temperatures at sea level with cooler temperatures at higher elevations on the drive from Kona; occasional rain showers; possible walks across uneven, rocky terrain including black lava rock,; red lava cannot be guaranteed on this tour;...

name: Gardens & Waterfall Tour
description: Umauma Falls are open to visitors from 8 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. every day. At this time you can drive on a concrete road right to the falls and tropical garden/river walk after stopping at the visitor center.  Take as little or as much time as you like.

name: Scuba Gear Rental
description: We offer daily rentals on all the necessities. We have BCDs, regulators, wetsuits, vests, fins, masks, snorkels, booties, air tanks, and more!

name: Beach Accessory Rental
description: Customers will receive a full refund with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Refunds will not be given for bringing gear back early. Contact us by phone to cancel or inquire about a cancellation. No-shows will be charged the full price.

name: Surf Board Rental
description: There’s no need to head to a Hilo surf shop when you can rent a surfboard from Hilo Ocean Adventures! We offer surfboards, boogie boards, and vehicle mounts so you can head to the beach and catch some waves! We offer daily and weekly rentals.

name: Land and Sky Combo - Circle Island Tour
description: Discover the Big Island’s magnificent beauty and its volcanic fury on this all-in-one Big Island helicopter tour.

name: Jungle Falls Bike Adventure
company: Botanical World Adventures - Segway Off Road and Zip Isle Zip Line
description: Surrounded by green rolling pastures and lush botanical scenery, this once well traveled road takes us back in time as we make our way through old plantation villages. These historic “backroads” take you over bridges from the early 1900’s.

name: Private Charter
description: Whether you're planning a family outing, a team-building day, or a once-in-a-lifetime adventure, our private charters are fully customizable to suit your group’s interests.

name: Kayak Rental
description: See our beautiful Hilo town while paddling in a kayak! We rent kayaks for 3 hours, daily, and weekly as well as vehicle mount kits to help with ease of transportation. We also include life vests and maps with each rental free of charge!

name: Private Kona Coast Experience
company: Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours - Big Island
description: Jump on one of our Private Kona Coast Experience Tours and get a birds eye view of one of the most stunning landscapes in the Hawaiian Islands.

name: Open Water Referral Dives Day 1 or 2
description:
We are happy to assist you with any tour date and time changes.
Guests will receive a full refund or credit when a booking is cancelled 48 hours before the booking is to begin.

description: Surfboard rentals may be picked up at our surf shop anytime between 9am and 4pm. All rentals must be returned to our surf shop during our normal business hours of 8:30am-5pm.

name: Vanilla Tasting + Farm Tour
description: You'll learn the difference between savory and sweet applications for Vanilla, as well as explore its use in a variety of dishes. After the Culinary Tasting presentation and sampling, you will be taken on a Farm Tour of our Hawaiian Vanilla Vineyard.

name: Ocean Swim
description: This program gives students the chance to use their skills out where it really matters as well as gain new and exciting knowledge about snorkeling, ocean safety, Hawaiian marine life, and so much more.

name: Exotic Fruit Tasting Tour
description: From sweet and juicy pineapples to tangy lychee, creamy avocados, and rare tropical treats, this tour is a feast for the senses.

name: Hawaiian Beach Cliffs Scenic Fat Tire E-Bike Tour
description: We will meet at HNF Gas Station in Keaau. Drive 35 minutes to Sea View, where we will tour our beautiful south eastern rainforest.

name: Wa’a (Hawaiian Outrigger Canoe) Rides
description: As we paddle into Kailua Bay and explore the coastline we will share stories about some of the local landmarks, the rich history of the area, and the role of the wa’a in Hawaiian culture.

name: Paddleboard Tours / Lessons
description: Paddle boarding originated in Hawaii, so leave the shore behind and join Kona Boys for a paddle. We offer lessons for those just getting their sea legs and paddle board historical tours for the more experienced.

name: Deluxe Afternoon Kayak & Snorkel Kealakekua Bay
description:
The Deluxe Kayak Kealakekua Bay & Snorkel Tours includes:
*Wide, stable open-deck tandem kayaks are used & you’ll appreciate our quality mask, snorkel & fins. Bottled water and drinks and snacks are also included, so there's no need to bring a lunch.

name: Group Surf Lesson
description: Surf lessons are the easiest and safest way to learn how to surf. Our professional surf instructors undergo annual training and certifications to make sure they deliver the best and safest surf lessons possible.

description: Surf lessons are the easiest and safest way to learn how to surf. Our professional surf instructors undergo annual training and certifications to make sure they deliver the best and safest surf lessons possible.

description: This full-day nature tour offers an in-depth look at Hawaii’s youngest and largest island. From desert to rainforest, pasture to dry forest, discover diverse landscapes and 8 out of 13 climate zones in the world as you explore the active volcanoes of...

name: Hybrid Liv-Alight
description: With its lightweight and durable ALUXX aluminum frame and upright flat-bar positioning, Alight is comfortable for a daily commute and sporty for longer rides. Women’s-specific geometry and sizing gives Alight a stable, confident ride quality.

name: PADI Open Water Diver Course eLearning
description:
What is PADI eLearning?
Electronic learning (eLearning) is the delivery of education, using your mobile device or web browser.

name: Nitrox eLearning Course
description: Learning to Scuba diving with Enriched Air Nitrox (Nitrox/EAN) gives you longer no decompression times, especially on repetitive scuba dives. You will be able to stay down longer and get back in the water sooner.

name: Divemaster Course
description: PADI Divemasters are highly sought after dive professionals who are able to work all over the world. From your local dive shop to exotic live-aboard dive boats abroad, lead dives, experience and share the amazing underwater world with others.

name: Rescue Diver Course Day 1
description: Scuba divers describe the PADI Rescue Diver course as the most challenging, yet most rewarding course they’ve ever taken. Why?

name: Rescue Diver Course Day 2
description: Scuba divers describe the PADI Rescue Diver course as the most challenging, yet most rewarding course they’ve ever taken. Why?

name: Private Guided Shore Dive
description: Our expertise is unparalleled. With highly knowledgeable instructors, we ensure that divers of all levels feel confident and safe throughout their underwater journey.

name: Buddy 125 (125CC)
description: Experience the beauty of Kailua Kona on a Genuine Buddy 125cc scooter rental. This classic-styled scooter is perfect for exploring the city's many beaches, lush terrain and coastline away from major traffic.

name: PRIVATE Kilauea Summit to Shore from Kona
description:
PUNALUU SWEET BREAD BAKERY
As we approach the southern area of the island, we’ll see vast lava fields as we make our way through one of the most active parts of Mauna Loa volcano.

name: PRIVATE Big Island Big Volcano Adventure from Kona
description: The last part of our adventure takes us up and along famous Saddle Road back to the island’s west side.

name: PRIVATE Big Island Big Volcano Adventure from Hilo
description: The last part of our adventure takes us up and along famous Saddle Road back to the island’s west side.

name: Polynesian Adventure ATV Tour
description: Island of Samoa, the Samoan people know how to have fun, in fact their sense of humor is known throughout Polynesia.

name: Private Charter (5 Star Package)
description: Reserve the Hoku ‘Elima for a 4 hour excursion of your choosing. You can either enjoy one of our standard trips with a cruise all to yourselves or customize a tour with a multitude of options of where to go and what to see.

name: Open Water Diver Course Day 2
description: Day 3 is optional but may be required for some students. Enrollment in the course does not guarantee graduation or certification.

name: Moke Electric Vehicle: Allowed only in WAIKOLOA RESORT. Top Speed 28mph
description: The Moke (rhymes with “bloke”) is far from a museum piece. Our electric car is versatile, carbon-free and efficient. This upgraded version has more—more legroom, expanded trunk space, a kickin’ sound system and sex appeal.

name: Premium Snorkeling Charter
description: Explore the Kona coast on a private snorkel adventure that brings you to iconic sites like the Captain Cook Monument and Makalawena Marine Sanctuary.

name: Private Whale Watching Charter
description: Cruise the calm waters of the Kona coast in search of Hawaii’s extraordinary marine life. You may encounter playful spinner dolphins, gliding rays, sea turtles, porpoises, tropical seabirds, and more.

name: Guided Three-hour Hike in Volcanoes National Park
description: What sets our three-hour guided tours apart is the exceptional quality of our guides. Each of them brings a wealth of wilderness experience and outstanding interpersonal skills, ensuring that your journey is both educational and enjoyable.

name: Flavors of Hawaii: A Bitesize History
description: With Trip Cancellation Protection: Cancel or reschedule any time up to 1 hour before departure. Receive a full refund, minus trip protection and processing fees.

name: Sunset Whale Watch Tour
description: Expert Guides: Our team consists of marine biologists and experienced naturalists who provide in-depth insights into the behavior and biology of the whales and other marine life.

name: Petting Zoo + Hand Feed & Cuddle Baby Goats Farm Experience
description: Come meet the sweetest little residents of our farm—our baby goats! This fun, hands-on experience invites you to help feed our playful kids and spend time cuddling, petting, and playing with them in a relaxed, open setting.

name: Kids Swim Lesson
description:
Business Policies:
Registration is required for every swimmer. You sign waivers for all minors on your account acknowledging the risk of swimming in the ocean for your entire family.

name: Skydiving
description:
Getting There is Half the Fun!
Your skydiving adventure begins with a breathtaking scenic flight over the most stunning landscapes of Hawaii Island.

name: Historic Kona
description: Boarding and Seat Arrangements - Boarding will be done from the rear to the front of the vehicle, with the respect of those passengers with disabilities to do so. Seat changes are not allowed throughout the duration of tour.

name: Pau Hana Sunset Sailing Catamaran
description: Enjoy the warm tropical breezes and unparalleled views of the Big Island aboard our legendary sailing catamaran. Sip on canned soft drinks, beers and wines from our complimentary bar, and munch on a variety of snacks.

name: Private Sunset Cruise
description: Experience the magic of a Hawaiian sunset at sea, while we travel along the stunning Kona coastline. Your crew will share Hawaiian stories and local history as we take in the sights and look for marine wildlife.

name: Private Full Day Charter
description: Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

name: Private 3/4 Day Charter
description: Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

description: Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

name: Lei Po'o Making Workshop (Flowered Head Lei) Saturday, January 10th
description: Together, we’ll begin by connecting with the land, mindfully harvesting ferns, flowers, and natural elements from the forest using respectful gathering practices.

name: Kayak/Snorkel
description: Customers will receive a full refund with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

name: Private Charter (Ali'i Package)
description: Encounter dolphins, snorkel with tropical fish, explore the coastline, enjoy the challenge of paddle boarding, the options go on and on. Your private charter consultant is standing by to help you design the perfect ocean experience!

name: Kona BIG 5 Ocean Safari
description: This 5-hour adventure will take you out into the “blue” to look for: pelagic mammals, sharks, and fish species.

name: PADI Discover Scuba Dive
description: Transportation to the dive site can be arranged either by driving or shuttle service. Upon arrival, you will be equipped with necessary gear by your guide and proceed to the ocean's waterline on foot.

name: Sunset Reef Dive
description: This is a one tank Sunset dive, from shore, off of the Kona Coast. We meet an hour before sunset to get ready and choose our dive site.

name: Open Water Diver Course Day 1
description: PADI Open Water Diver Course includes Scuba Gear (Mask, Snorkel, Fins, Booties, Wet Suit, Regulator, BCD, Tanks, Weights and De-Fog), Snacks, Soft Drinks and Scuba Lessons.

name: Advanced Open Water Day 1
description: You don’t have to be “Advanced” to take it - it’s designed to advance your diving, so you can start right after earning your PADI Open Water Diver certification.

name: Shaka Sail
description: The Shaka Sail is our recently remodeled 40’ Woody Brown sailing catamaran. The Shaka Sail is spacious with plenty of room for sunbathing on the trampoline nets, a cabin dining area, marine head, stand up paddle boards, and lounge area at the stern.

name: Polaris Slingshot R
description: The Ultimate Joyride!! There is no better way to explore the island than with the exciting new Slingshot from Polaris. This exotic looking 3 wheel vehicle drives just like a regular car and needs no special license.

name: North Coast Loop Tour - Navigation Guided
description: Our Big Island North Coast Loop tour is a great way to spend an afternoon! It combines an awesome oceanside drive, fantastic views, then a curvy mountain road on your return.

name: Waterfall Wonders Slingshot Adventure Tour - Navigation Guided
description: Our Waterfall Wonders tour takes you on a breathtaking journey. Beginning with a trek to the east side of the island. For the performance minded you can take Old Saddle road, the rollercoaster of Big Island.

name: Double Valley Slingshot Adventure Tour - Navigation Guided
description: Our Double Valley Tour is a grand day on the Big Island of Hawaii! It combines an awesome oceanside drive, multiple lookout points, fantastic views, a curvy mountain road, shopping, malasadas, and even the option to take the “Roller Coaster Road” for...

name: Volcano Slingshot Grand Adventure Tour - Navigation Guided
description: The Volcano…the reason you chose the Big Island of Hawaii as your vacation spot. Volcanoes National Park is home to the only active volcanoes in the Hawaiian Islands.

name: Shaka Speed
description: The newest addition to our fleet, the Shaka Speed is a 27’ Scout. The vessel features a BBQ grill, transom gate for easy water entry, marine head, plush seating & shade, two live bait wells, and the ability to hit 25 knots.

name: Kona Tradewind Day Sail
description: Experience the beauty of the Kona Coast from a new perspective aboard the Spirit of Aloha sailing catamaran.

name: Luxury Custom Private Charter
description: Niolo Nui is a 2018 32’ Center Console Edgewater that comes equipped with two powerful Yamaha Twin Yamaha F300 outboard engines to make any ocean conditions an extra smooth ride.

name: Waikoloa Resort Mini Session
description: This is a non-refundable deposit. Clients will only receive a refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. Contact us by phone to cancel or inquire about a cancellation.

name: Beach Portrait Session
description:
Q: How do you handle kids or toddlers who won’t sit still?
A: I mean, good luck getting a toddler to sit still for more than 30 seconds. We lean into what toddlers do naturally. No sense in fighting them, it just makes things worse.

name: Fat Tire E-Bike Tour Kalapana Beach Road and Volcanoes National Park
description:
Inside Volcanoes National Park we will have time for you to enjoy lunch at one of the few restaurants located inside the park. (cost of lunch not included in tour fee)
Once back on our Fat Tire E-Bikes, you will never fight for a parking spot.

name: Deluxe Tasting
description: Much like a wine tasting with the vintner or sommelier, our knowledgeable baristas will guide you through a carefully curated gastric tour of our award-winning specialty coffees. This experience will include a taste from all five of our farms.

name: Snorkel Adventure Power Catamaran
description: Our Snorkel Adventure Cruise will take you to the BEST pristine reefs on the coast (we have more than a dozen sites to choose from).

name: Sip & Pair Wine and Chocolate Experience
description: Wine has also been a passion of ours for years. We found that the more we delved into the world of winemaking, the more we improved how we make our chocolate and educate our customers.

name: Manta Ray Snorkel Charter
description: **The number of mantas will often vary in accordance to the naturally occurring levels of plankton present. Plankton levels are impossible to predict and can even change throughout the course of a night.

name: Luxury Beach Portrait Experience

name: Manoa Falls Rainforest & Self|Guided Hike
description: Check out our Combos & Special Packages! You can pair the Diamond Head Hike with the Makapuʻu Lighthouse Trail, or combine the Diamond Head Hike with a visit to Manoa Falls—all in a single day.

name: Ko Olina Exclusive Snorkel + Lunch
description: After anchoring, get ready for some fun in the water. Our professional snorkeling gear and instruction will get you in and under the sea to view our vast array of tropical fish, Hawaiian Green Sea Turtles, eels and much more!

name: Ko Olina Captain's Sunset + Tasting
description: Upon departing the docks grab a drink as we hoist the sail and make way to the horizon, maybe even dropping a fishing line or two. As with all our cruises, keep an eye on the water as ocean life can be found at anytime, anywhere.

name: Ko Olina Private Charter
description: While on your Ko Olina Charter, have the options of snorkeling, sightseeing, marine mammal observing, sailing, fishing and more.

name: Pearl Harbor & USS Arizona with Downtown Honolulu
description:
For the best experience we recommend buying the audio guide* for the perfect experience during the self-guided part of the tour (not included)*. 
After your Pearl Harbor visit we will give you a FREE City Tour of Downtown Honolulu.

description:

Honolulu, Hawaii 96814, United States

name: PRIVATE Complete Island Adventure with Sunrise
description: Breathtaking sunrise at Sandy Beach, with plenty of time for photos and quiet reflection. Visits to hidden gems and iconic landmarks such as the Ko’olau Mountains, Byodo-In Temple, and more.

name: Wreck & Reef – 2 Tank Dive Charter
description: During the first of our two dives, we'll explore one of Oahu's many wrecks, ranging in depth from 74 to 123 feet.

name: Whale Watching
description: Want to see some whales? Come find them with us. The Adventure Boat can cover more ground in our whale watching adventures because we can go farther and faster than anyone else to make sure you get a good look at these graceful giants.

name: USS Arizona Narrated Tour / Virtual Reality Combo
description: This program DOES NOT include the boat tickets to the USS Arizona Memorial, nor are they needed to participate in this tour. Please visit the National Park Service website at Recreation.gov or call toll-free US/Canada at 1-877-444-6777.

name: Waikiki Coast Cruise - BYOB
description: This is a a must-do activity! Cruise out from Waikiki, with a picturesque view of Waikiki Beach, south shore Oahu, and Diamond Head. Relax on board with a drink as you keep an eye out for various marine life, to include turtles and dolphins.

name: Waikiki Deluxe Whale Watch Sail
description: Enjoy tropical cocktails, beer, wine, or soft drinks from our full premium bar while soaking up the sunshine and ocean breeze. Whale sightings are guaranteed — if you don’t see one, come again free! Morning sails are 2 hours; afternoon sails are 1.

We are conveniently located at Kewalo Basin Harbor in Honolulu. The meeting point is 1085 Ala Moana Blvd, unit 104. Please arrive 30 minutes prior to your tour time to allow for parking.

description: Introducing our latest innovation: the solar-powered electric-assist bicycle tour. Featuring an 11-speed drivetrain, 250-watt motor, and 500-watt battery, our e-bikes offer a powerful boost for climbing while maintaining the exhilarating feel of ridi...

name: Private Waikiki Boat Tour
description: Join us for a private, intimate boat tour along the stunning Waikiki coastline. With a maximum of six guests, our tours ensure a personalized and memorable experience.

name: Pau Hana Cruise
description:
What is "Pau Hana"?
In Hawaiian, Pau Hana means “finished work.” It’s the cherished time to relax, connect, and celebrate after a busy day. Embrace the island spirit and unwind on the water with this one-of-a-kind sunset cruise.

name: Bodyboarding Lessons!
description: Here at Ohana Surf Project we believe our clients are like family, and we strive to provide the best service to every person who chooses to join us on the water and we welcome their loved ones who come along to support them as well.

name: Salute to Pearl Harbor - from Waikiki
description: Stand at ground zero of the infamous attack and gaze up at a sky once filled with enemy planes. This is the place where history was made. Immerse yourself in the sights, sounds and personal stories of Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941.

name: Mermaid Snorkel Tour & Photo Shoot - Honolulu
description: Once you make your reservation, we pair you with your own personal mermaid guide. Your mermaid guide will start the tour out in shallow water to get everyone comfortable with using the mermaid tail and snorkeling gear.

name: Friday Night Fireworks (Kealoha)
description: Witness the beauty of exploding fireworks over Waikiki Beach in Hawaii on our Friday Night Fireworks cruise. Bring your special person or start your weekend party with a bang. This cruise is offered once a week, so don’t miss the boat!

name: Waikiki Turtle Canyon Snorkel
description: The tour departs from Kewalo Basin Harbor in Honolulu. The cruise takes about 2.5 hours, and it includes time for snorkeling, sightseeing, and learning. All equipment is provided, and there is no experience necessary.

name: PADI Open Water Referral Course
description: Dive Oahu reserves the right to alter charter/course details or cancel charters/courses should it be necessary, due to adverse weather, minimum passenger requirements, staffing, or other related conditions.

description: After a traditional Hawaiian oli (ancient prayer) in dedication to safe passage and for seeking knowledge, we'll set sail to find wild Hawaiian spinner dolphins. Once we've found them, you can watch them in their natural habitat.

name: Conservation Snorkeling Tour with Sea Turtles
description: What sets our program apart is the integration of cutting-edge technology. Participants are not only treated to the mesmerizing sight of sea turtles but also engage in an innovative conservation approach.

Please read carefully – our meeting spot can be tricky to find. The pub crawl meets at the corner of Ala Moana Blvd. and Kalakaua Ave. in front of the Fort DeRussy sign at 1979 Ala Moana Blvd., Honolulu, HI 96815.

You can park your Moped/Motorcycle rental where ever vehicles may park.  Please park near a pole or a fixed object of some kind so you may lock your rental to it(moped).

No. In keeping with federal guidelines and the Dolphin SMART program, we do not allow swimming with or approaching wild dolphins in the water.

description: Not seeing manta rays is an extremely rare occurrence, and since the manta rays are obviously wild animals, we have no control over the matter. We cannot predict if we will see them on any given night or at any particular tour time.

name: Custom Private Tours
description: Experience the best that Oahu has to offer while enjoying your tour in the company of friends or family. We’ll design your day of sightseeing and/or active adventure based on your priorities and preferences. Everything is personalized.

name: Aloha Historic Tour - Pearl Harbor Premium
description:
USS Bowfin Submarine Museum & Park
The USS Bowfin Submarine is moored proudly near the Arizona Memorial, ready to welcome visitors to the fabled era of WW II submarines and their crews.

name: Oahu Hawaiian Sunrise Tour
description: Start your day off right by enjoying the famous Hawaiian sunrise while checking out some of the most exquisite locations on the Windward side of Oahu, including views of the magnificent Ko’Olau Mountain range.

name: Sunset to Diamond Head
description: We then glide up Diamond Head Road – riding the ‘face’ of Diamond Head Crater and take in the stunning $Million-dollar estates as you approach the historic Diamond Head Lighthouse and the Amelia Earhart lookout just in time for our Hawaiian sunset.

name: Kayak Whale Watch Makena
company: Maui Eco Tours/South Pacific Kayak/Kelii's Kayaks
description: Tiki Team Adventures provides marketing sales & support for a number of excellent different activity companies identified below.

name: Maui South Shore Explorer
company: Maui Eco Tours/South Pacific Kayak/Kelii's Kayaks
description: Enjoy the scenery, and don't double back!. Paddle along the highly acclaimed south Maui beaches, exclusive beach front homes of south Maui, the high-end resorts of Wailea, and through to the renowned Makena Bay area (a.k.a. Turtle Town).

name: Sunset/Glow Clear Kayak Tour - Olowalu
description: Watch the sun set behind the beautiful island of Lanai from the waters of Maui. Then look through your clear kayak as we explore Hawaii’s oldest reef system to see the transition of our day and night animals.

name: Kapa Kuiki Workshop with Puamana Crabbe Designs
description: You'll BYOG - Bring Your Own (1) Garment- and help to design a one-of-a-kind piece with your pick of (2) of Puamana's new appliqué she has curated, inspired from our Quilt Collection. No sewing experience or sewing machines are necessary!

name: Private Turtle Reef Discovery

description: Tiki Team Adventures provides marketing sales & support for a number of excellent different activity companies identified below.

company: Maui Eco Tours/South Pacific Kayak/Kelii's Kayaks
description: Our staff of full time guides will show you all of the underwater spectacles themselves, as we are the only snorkeling outfitter that guarantee our staff gets right in the water with you.

company: Maui Eco Tours/South Pacific Kayak/Kelii's Kayaks
description: Tiki Team Adventures provides marketing sales & support for a number of excellent different activity companies identified below.

description: Our 12:45 am Na Pali Coast Power Catamaran tour has a 12:15 am check-in at the Kikiaola Boat Harbor. As we begin our journey toward the beautiful Na Pali Coast, you will have the opportunity to experience Hawaii’s amazing marine wildlife including do...

name: Group Kayak Whale Watch
description: Our experienced guides have spent nearly all of their lives surfing, fishing, diving, spear-fishing and paddling canoe!!!!! Listen to their stories as they share their mana'o (knowledge) passed on through generations as you relive a part of Hawai'i.

name: Self Guided Kayak and Snorkel Discovery
description: Want to kayak to the sandbar? This is the package for you! For those that want to go on their own and choose their own adventure! This package is the complete He'eia State Park, Kane'ohe Bay land and sea experience.

name: Kayak, Snorkel & Restore the Ecosystem
description: Description: From Waikiki, Bus #55 departs Ala Moana at approximately 8 am and will stop at He'eia State Park. This option is Not recommended as service is infrequent, very limited and unreliable. Check TheBus or Google Maps for current schedules.

name: Private Tour
description: Private tours offer an in-depth experience of the architecture and history of Liljestrand House. Tours take approximately 90 minutes. Visits can be arranged by appointment pending schedule availability.

name: Private Sunset Tour
description: Sunset tours offer a one-hour tour experience highlighting the architecture and history of Liljestrand House along with the opportunity to enjoy wine and light appetizers on the upstairs lanai overlooking Diamond Head.

name: Hawaiian Language and Hula Immersion Program:  3 Day Interactive Tour
description:
Overview:
This three-day interactive and immersive tour in Big Island, Hawaii, offers visitors an in-depth exploration of the Hawaiian language and an introduction to Hula, the traditional Hawaiian dance.

name: The Melodies of Aloha
description: Explore the authentic heartbeat of Hawai'i through a one-day interactive journey that showcases the beautiful significance of traditional Hawaiian music.

name: Group Sunset Tour
description: Group sunset tours offer a one-hour tour experience highlighting the architecture and history of Liljestrand House along with the opportunity to enjoy wine and light pupu on the upstairs lanai overlooking Diamond Head.

name: Guided Kayak & Snorkel Adventure
description: Your adventure starts on land at He'eia State Park, where your guides will outfit you with dry bags, life jackets, and snorkeling gear.

name: Lahaina Paddle
description: We have had so many requests for a paddle-only trip that we just created a NEW tour designed especially for those kayakers that just want to paddle.  We begin our tour with an easy launch from the calm, protected shores near downtown Lahaina.

name: Diamond Head Crater & Waterfall Hike
description: We start with a two-hour walk through the forest to the classic Hawaiian forty-meter waterfall. The total length (round trip) Route easy initial category 2,5 km.

name: Big Island of Hawaii - Island of Volcanoes
description: The main attraction of the island - an active volcano. Have you ever come on top of an erupting volcano? - 40-minute flight takes you to Hilo - the island's capital.

name: Private Tour
description: The information is similar to what is offered on our public tours, as is the tour agenda: we start with a brief introduction to our work, followed by rules for interacting with the octopus.

name: Hula Harmony: A 3-Day Cultural Music Immersion on the Big Island
description:
Overview:
Hula Harmony is a three-day interactive tour focused on educating visitors about the rich history and cultural significance of Hawaiian music.

description: Departing from Waianae Boat Harbor and serving the west side of the island and catering to the island visitor staying nearby in Ko Olina resorts. However, all are welcome.

description: Experience the #1 visited sight in Hawaii and discover all Pearl Harbor has to offer with E Noa Tours. This full-day tour at Pearl Harbor is one of the most popular excursions on the island.

description: タンタラスの丘夜景鑑賞ツアーは穴場ハワイにおいて多くの方から支持していただいております大人気ツアーです。私たちのモットーは夜のハワイでのお時間を効率よく充実して楽しんでいだだき、さらに現実から非現実な世界を体験をしていただくことです。全てのプランに、超有名店レナーズのふわふわ揚げパン「マラサダ」もついてきます。さらにアメリカ大型スーパーマーケッ﻿ト「セーフウェイ」へのうれしい寄り道や、ガイドによる丁寧なハワイの情報満載なトーク、温かいハワイアン･ティーと共に、タンタラスの美しい夜景をお楽しみくだ...

name: Waimea Falls Oahu Circle Island Tour
description: Green World Coffee Farm sample freshly roasted island coffee while learning about locally grown beans. Dole Plantation Stroll through pineapple gardens, shop for souvenirs, or cool off with a refreshing Dole Whip.

name: East Side Oahu Island Tour
description: Experience the very best of Oʻahu on this full-day circle island adventure. From volcanic craters and dramatic coastlines to sacred temples and charming local towns, this tour blends scenic beauty, cultural insight, and island flavors into one unforg...

name: Sights and Shopping Tour - Navigation Guided
description: Want to see some of the most beautiful lookout spots on the island? Want to get that perfect gift for yourself or a loved one? Enjoy starting off at the Aloha Swap Meet (Wed, Sat and Sun only!

name: East Coast to Mountain Loop - Navigation Guided
description: The East Coast to Mountain Tour gives you a glimpse into the beauty that Oahu has to offer. Heading out of Waikiki to the east you will pass the Diamond Head Crater and drop into the Hawaii Kai area with its hillside mansions.

name: 金曜日のみのタンタラス花火ツアー
description: 金曜日のプランでは、超有名店レナーズのマラサダを食べながらヒルトンホテル裏から間近で打ち上げられる花火ショーが楽しめ、花火を見た後にQUEENS WHOLEFOODS店にて1時間お食事と買い物の自由時間を堪能。

name: Venture Ko Olina Whale Watch
description: Enjoy your afternoon on the search for these gentle giants while enjoying the beautiful mountain views the leeward coast. Have a chance to be serenaded by whale-song as we dip our hydrophone in the water to be fully immersed in their world.

name: Wai Kai Lagoon Adventure
description: The safety of our guests is our number one priority and weather conditions are always taken into consideration. The LineUp at Wai Kai reserves the right to cancel any reservation if conditions are deemed unsafe (e.g. high winds or lightning).

name: Cultural Food Tour - Navigation Guided
description: For all our “foodies” out there, THIS is the tour for you! The cultural food tour allows an exhilarating drive to and from locally owned restaurants, food trucks, dive restaurants, scenic lookouts, and oh so much more!

name: Circle Island Tour
description: Dole Plantation: This is what you have been waiting for!! Try the non-dairy pineapple ice cream that is called the Dole Whip! Get it in a cup or a cone, or try it our favorite way, which is the Dole Whip float!

name: Private Charter
description: Your Hawaiian Doors Off helicopter tour begins with a beautiful view of Keehi Lagoon and continues over historic Honolulu Harbor, Aloha Tower, and the Natural Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific.

name: Waikiki Couples Snorkel Retreat
description: Create new memories aboard this well set charter with your significant other - "Couples Only Retreat". Renowned for its sense of aloha, enjoy the postcard Waikiki setting of what travellers have dreamed over for beyond a century.

name: Private Charter

name: Sunset Booze Cruise
description: Rent a private boat for you and your guests to watch the sunset in beautiful Maunalua Bay or even just cruise around and enjoy the scenery of Hawaii Kai. BYOB or anything you want to drink. Cooler with ice provided.

What should I bring with me? What should I wear?  
We will gather your shoes upon arrival and store them in a basket on board with us.  Wear anything that is comfortable.  If you plan to swim, wear a suit.  Bring a towel and sunscreen.

name: Volcano & Waterfall Adventure

description: Get ready for an awesome 5-hour fishing trip where you can mix it up with bottom fishing and trolling. We're talking about a shot at snagging some cool catches like tuna, mahi-mahi, snapper, trevally, and more.

description: We start the tour at Kupa’a farms, where you will learn everything about how chocolate is grown, harvested, fermented, dried, crushed and processed to become the goodness we all love.

name: Northern Gems Tour
description: We will do a full tour of the North half of the big island which offers beautiful waterfalls scenic lookouts, luscious rainforests, black sand beaches and historic towns. Spending as much or as little time at each location as you like!

name: Sunset Surf
description: Experience the thrill of surfing during a 90-minute sunset session tailored for all skill levels. Start with a safety briefing and land lesson at the surf shop, covering basic skills like paddling, surfboard handling, and water safety.

name: Narrated History Tour of Oahu
description: 7 hour tour offering a narrated history of Oahu and Hawaii while taking in amazing views. Eat lunch in historic Hale’Iwa and travel the Kaneohe coastline. 10+ stops for adventure, pictures, and shopping!

name: West Maui sightseeing
description:
Pick up at your place of residence (Westside only)
Private guided sightseeing  tour all the way to Kahakuloa and back.

name: Guided Snorkeling Tour
description: Expect wonderful colors, plentiful fish, and snorkeling with turtles. The western reefs offer a topography very unique to Oahu making it some of Hawaii's best snorkeling sites.

name: Private Lesson
description: Whether it's a birthday celebration, a bachelorette party, a team building experience with coworkers, or some family-fun time, private classes can be catered to your needs. We can make the class as easy or as challenging as you would like!

name: Private Tour: All Sizes
description:
🗺️ We have LOTS of flexibility and we're not "locked-in" to a set route.
📍 If we want to spend more time somewhere, add stops, or adjust for traffic or weather we can.

name: Private Luxury Road to Hana Tour
description: Paramount Tours takes you on one of the most beautiful journey's in the world in a Private Luxury SUV for comfort and Privacy.

name: Private Tour
description: The tour includes snorkeling with sea turtles, seasonal whale watching, and learning Hawaiian history and culture. Juice/water and snorkel gear are provided.

name: 10 passengers max Private Charters
description: Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 48 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

name: Road to Hana
description: This tour will take you to one of the most remote and breathtaking towns in Hawai‘i. Along the legendary Road to Hāna, you’ll encounter lush rainforests, cascading waterfalls, and awe-inspiring coastal views that exceed even your wildest imagination.

name: Private Ko Olina Resort to Airport
description: IES Hawai'i provides transportation services from Aulani, Ko Olina, or the Four Seasons to all major Waikiki Hotels.

name: Private Airport to Ko Olina Resort - NOT LIVE
description: IES Hawai'i provides transportation services from Daniel K. Inouye International Airport to Aulani, Ko Olina, or the Four Seasons.

name: Halfway to Hana
description: Embark on a journey to Ke‘anae, one of the last self-sustaining Hawaiian villages. Drive along the Road to Hāna and take in stunning coastal views, cascading waterfalls, and the refreshing beauty of island life.

name: Custom Private Tour
description: Thinking of something not so cliché? Inquire about exploring Haleakala’s summit, our West Maui adventures, or private Farm Tours! Our guides know the ins and outs of Maui’s beautifully hidden secrets, and we are eager to share them with you.

name: Private Surf Lesson - Kalama
description: Surf Lessons: Your surf instructor will be at the beach to meet you and teach you the basics before entering the water. Once you enter the water, your instructor will be there with you helping you catch waves and giving you hands on coaching.

name: Maui Surfing-  Private Lessons
description:
*All Equipment Included.
*Our professional instructors are CPR & First Aid certified.
*Classes are scheduled at 8 am & again at 10:00 am, (The best time to surf in Hawaii is early morning before the tradewinds come in!).

name: Road to Hana Tour
description: We will be making approximately 5-6 stops along the way, not including our regular bathroom stops. All of our Road to Hana stops are weather permitting and subject to change if any location is deemed unsafe by our driver or tour guide!

name: Road to Hana
description: Includes Historical Sites, Trail Hikes, Waterfalls, a Black Sand Beach, a sample of Red Sand Beach, Charles Lindberg Gravesite & more…

name: Private Sanctuary Tours
description: Kids are welcome and tours are appropriate for all ages but for everyone's safety, we request that groups have a maximum of 2 children 12 and under per adult. We are located outside of Laupahoehoe on the east side of Hawaii's Big Island.

name: Aloha 2026 New Year's Eve Party
company: Nā Lei Aloha • An Experience Kilohana Hula Show
description:
• Reservations may be cancelled Online, via email info@experiencekilohana.com or by calling our Reservations Desk at (808) 897-2906.
• Full refunds are available up to 7 days prior to the event. 50% refunds are available up to 5 days prior.

name: Westin Hapuna Beach Resort Stargazing
description: A one-hour guided tour of the Sky using our 11-inch Celestron Schmidt Cassegrain Telescope. We will point out the constellations using a green laser pointer, and the Astronomer will provide Starlore and astronomy facts.

name: Private Sprinter: 7-13 Seats
description:
🗺️ We have LOTS of flexibility and we're not "locked-in" to a set route.
📍 If we want to spend more time somewhere, add stops, or adjust for traffic or weather we can.

name: Diamond Head Hike/Tour via Moped
description: Will begin on Kuhio Avenue and ride the scooters to the beginning of Waikiki to Fort Derussy Beach park and drive by and show the army museum. Take Kalakaua ave to Kaimana beach and the war Memorial outdoor pool.

name: Manoa Falls Hike, Punch Bowl, and Historic Downtown Tour via Moped
description: Will begin on Kuhio Street and drive the Mopeds to Manoa Falls and do the hike. From Manoa Falls go to the Punch bowl and take pictures. From the Punch Bow we’ll drive through historic downtown Honolulu back to gas up and drop off the mopeds.

name: Semi Private Surf Lesson
description: You'll have more focused attention between the two of you than you would in a large group lesson. Learn to surf and enjoy an experience you wont forget!

name: Private Waikiki to Ko Olina Resort
description: IES Hawai'i provides transportation services from all major Waikiki Hotels to Aulani, Ko Olina, or the Four Seasons.

name: Oahu Private Island Tour - Waikiki, North Shore, and the Dole Plantation
description: Stop at highlights such as the Dole Pineapple Plantation, Haleiwa Town, Diamond Head, and the Halona Blowhole. Flexible itinerary can be tailored to your interests.

name: Private Tour
description: Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

name: Oahu Private Tour Custom
description: Didn't you see where you want to go on other private tours we listed? No worries let us know where you want to go/see we will make a custom private tour for you!

name: Small Group Private Tour (1-4 People)
description: Join us for an unforgettable Hawaiian adventure in our convertible Ford Bronco. We take fun people on the ultimate journey, blending verdant mountains with pristine, sun-kissed beaches.

name: Oahu Circle Island Tour - Private Tour
description: Visit key sites from the comfort of our Honda Odyssey Elite mini-van, and circle the island while taking in the gorgeous scenery.

name: Windsurfing 101
company: Maui Eco Tours/South Pacific Kayak/Kelii's Kayaks

name: Private After Hours Guided Stargazing + BYO Barbecue
description: We provide the farm-to-table mocktail mixer + you bring anything else you like. You can buy organic produce from our farm stand, or bring your own food to grill on the barbecue.

name: Private Surf Lesson - Ukumehame
description: Surf Lessons: Your surf instructor will be at the beach to meet you and teach you the basics before entering the water. Once you enter the water, your instructor will be there with you helping you catch waves and giving you hands on coaching.

EPIC Adventure Tour

--> Diamond Head

--> Makapuu Point

--> Tropical Farms Macadamia Nuts: Sample Local Coffee, Mac Nuts and Hawaiian treats

description:
