Choose between a Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Obstacle bounce house or an Obstacle-Slide bounce house, or get both for +$400. Rental lasts for the duration of the party reservation unless otherwise specified.

name: Magic Classes at Hilton Waikiki Beach Resort & Spa
Malama Hawaii Planting Tour
description: The Malama Hawaii program at North Shore Stables provides locals and visitors a way to leave a positive and long-term impact by restoring shorelines and native ecosystems located on the North Shore Stables property.

name: Polaris Slingshot
description: Zip through the Hawaiian landscape in a current model year, low mileage Polaris Slingshot. Navigation, Rockford Fosgate Bluetooth stereo systems, upgraded comfortable seats, and lockable storage are standard on our fleet.

name: Luxury Celebration Picnic : Three - Twenty Guests
description: When you choose our luxury picnic experience, you can create memories that will last a lifetime. We have hosts who care deeply about your experience and enjoy providing exceptional service that will exceed your expectations.

name: Lagoon Sport Rentals
description: The safety of our guests is our number one priority and weather conditions are always taken into consideration. The LineUp at Wai Kai reserves the right to cancel any reservation if conditions are deemed unsafe (e.g. high winds or lightning).

name: Paina Waikiki Luau
description: Trips will run rain or shine. All trips are subject to change or be canceled without notice due to the weather or other unforeseen circumstance.

name: Beach Proposal Picnic
description: Enjoy the sunset with a luxury picnic at one of Hawaii's most stunning and famous beaches. As you arrive, we will set out a charcuterie board (or, as we call snacks in Hawaii, Pupus) to satisfy your hunger and allow you to immerse your five senses in...

name: Premium Supervised Rental Fliteboard
description: Supervised rental of Flite board equipment with Efoil Waikiki. Rental board will have a fully charged battery, and the duration of your rental will depend on how quickly you use up the battery, typically 45min-1.

name: Beach Cooler Rental
description: Simply choose your delivery date from our booking calendar (available dates are in green). Click the blue "BOOK" button. Then select how many coolers you wish to rent for your weekly rental.

name: 2020 Harley-Davidson Street Glide w/107cu,  Bluetooth
description: 107 Milwaukee Eight Engine. Ride the island in style with this Harley. Has a stereo system with Bluetooth, cruise control, passenger backrest and luggage carrier, and hard locking saddlebags to protect your valuables.

name: 2020 Heritage Softail w/107cu
description: 107 Engine. Ride the island in style with this Harley. Has a passenger backrest and Windshield NO SADDLEBAGS!!!!

name: July 4th - Independence Day Waikiki Firework Cruise
description: The July 4th - Independence Day Waikiki Firework Cruise offers an unforgettable and unique perspective of the Waikiki fireworks. Guests can enjoy the stunning display from the water, creating a memorable experience.

name: Custom Lesson, Group Size And Time Available
Ohana Nui - 1 Hour Photoshoot
description: *Photoshoots taken on the west side of Maui. Additional fees may apply for traveling to other locations.

name: Aloha Surf Tour
description: We will pick you up from your Hotel in Waikiki and take you to best and most popular surfing spots where the best surfers in the World Come every year to compete for the World's most popular Championship , including Pipeline, Sunset beach, Waimea Bay...

name: Aloha Customized Tour
description:
As the name says: it is a Customized tour!
We will carefully plan the experience, a real and unforgettable journey based on your vibes!
What are your interests? What would you like to visit? What did you dream of when coming to Hawaii?

name: Private Event
description: Are you tired of isolating? Host a small, safe, socially distanced outdoor event that includes paddling up the river and exclusive use of our private deck afterwards to eat and socialize.

name: Flotation Therapy - Daily Rental, Flotation Wetsuit, Goggles, Headphones
description: Rental for 24 hours. Rental only of Airtime Watertime Flotation Wetsuits, Goggles, Waterproof Headphones with sample sunscreen. Use equipments on your own time.

name: WBS • Hourly Beach Umbrella & Chair Set
description:
-A full deposit will be taken at the time of booking.

name: Hele Hele - 90 Min Photoshoot
description: *Photoshoots taken on the west side of Maui. Additional fees may apply for traveling to other locations.

name: Aloha Relax Tour
description: The first stop is at The Byodo-In Temple, a non-denominational Buddhist temple located in Valley of the Temples Memorial Park. The temple is a replica of a 900-year-old Buddhist temple at Uji in Kyoto Prefecture of Japan.

name: Aloha Shopping Tour
description: And if after the 2 first stops you still didn't fulfill your urge for fashion, don't worry we have one more stop!! The International Market Place an open-air shopping center located in Waikīkī.

name: Group Surf Lesson
description: We provide surf instruction and a water safety briefing prior to entering the ocean. Our small class size and the latest equipment ensures our guests a safe and enjoyable experience.

name: Family Portrait Session Bronze
description:
Includes:
• 1 hour session
• 1 perfect location
• 30 professionally edited photos (with option to purchase full gallery)
• Private online gallery for viewing and digital downloads

name: Upcountry Afternoon Tea
description: The perfect way to relax and unwind on a weekend afternoon, our Tea features signature Hawaiian Vanilla Vineyard Tea blends, a delicious array of savory treats, and decadent desserts.

name: Waikoloa Marriott Sunset / Sunrise Session
description: Vacations are too precious, so document it with a Beach portrait session! We describe our visual style as Candid, Vibrant and Wholesome. What sets us apart is how easy we make the process from beginning to end.

name: Polaris Slingshot Rentals
description: Optimum open-air adventures for the Bored in Life! Traverse the Big Island of Hawaii with a thrilling new Slingshot from Polaris.
